topComments.author: Evelyn Reyes
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Seguro e divertido para todas as idades... Eu e minha fam√≠lia gostamos do nosso parque aqu√°tico local... Trouxemos nosso pr√≥prio almo√ßo e sentamos sob as √°rvores na sombra do lado de fora do parque, mas h√° barracas de comida dentro do parque. Aten√ß√£o, eles permitem refrigeradores, mas N√ÉO EXISTEM COMIDA OU BEBIDAS (apenas garrafas de √°gua). definitivamente estarei comprando ingressos para a temporada ano que vem!! üòÅ  (Original) Safe and Fun for all ages... Me and my family enjoyed our local water park... We brought our own lunch and sat under the trees in the shade outside the park, but there is food stands inside the park.. Just a heads up they do allow coolers but NO OUTSIDE FOOD OR DRINKS (water bottles only) .. There are lawn chairs to layout in the sun and enjoy the view and catch some rays or watch your kids enjoy themselves playing in the water.. We will definitly be buying season tickets next year!! üòÅ

topComments.author: Sinthia Petote
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Lugar perfeito para uma divertida viagem de ver√£o. Minha filha se divertiu muito. A atmosfera, temperatura da √°gua, funcion√°rios e comida era √≥tima. Eu recomendo totalmente este parque aqu√°tico.  (Original) Perfect place for a fun summer trip. My daughter had so much fun. The atmosphere, water temperature, employees and food was great. I totally recommend this water park.

topComments.author: E M
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Costumava ser um local agrad√°vel para levar sua fam√≠lia e se divertir, mas agora virou gueto. Definitivamente precisa alugar um arm√°rio por US $ 6, n√£o deixe seus pertences importantes espalhados! Mas o mais importante se voc√™ possui um Honda cuidado com os ladr√µes de catalisadores tamb√©m. O meu foi roubado do estacionamento em frente √† entrada principal. N√£o h√° c√¢meras na propriedade e a seguran√ßa ou a pol√≠cia nem sempre est√£o patrulhando. Pessoas malvadas e pat√©ticas por a√≠!!  (Original) Used to be a nice spot to take your family and enjoy yourselves, but it's gotten ghetto.. Definitely need to rent a locker for $6, dont leave your important possessions laying out!  But most importantly if you own a Honda beware of catalytic converter thieves as well. Mine was stolen right from the parking lot in front of the main entrance.  There are no cameras on the property and security or police is not always there patrolling. Evil pathetic people out there!!

topComments.author: Kyeshia Shodunke
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Esta j√≥ia local üíé √© um √≥timo lugar para se visitar em dias e noites quentes de ver√£o üî•. Eu recomendo que voc√™ compre os ingressos com anteced√™ncia, o ingresso no mesmo dia pode estar esgotado no dia em que voc√™ decidir visitar. Mal posso esperar para a nossa pr√≥xima visita. Ano que vem estaremos comprando PASSE DE TEMPORADA!  (Original) This local gem üíé is a great place to visit on hot üî• summer days & nights. I would recommend that you purchase tickets in advance, same day ticket could be sold out on the day you decide to visit. Can hardly wait for our next visit. Next year we'll be purchasing SEASON PASSES!

topComments.author: Stormy Stokes
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Meus filhos gostaram deste lugar. Muita divers√£o. H√° arm√°rios para guardar seus pertences custam US $ 6, voc√™ pode obter na loja de presentes, a grande piscina de tobo√°gua √© uma piscina de caminhada de cerca de 3 p√©s. √ìtimo lugar para se refrescar. V√° cedo antes da hora do rush, fica lotado. Um lugar divertido. A comida custa US$ 10 ou mais. Divers√£o divers√£o divers√£o.  (Original) My children enjoyed this place. Lots of fun. There are lockers to store your belongings cost $6, you can get at the gift store, the big slide pool is a walking pool about 3 feet. Great place to cool off. Go early before the rush hour it gets crowded. A fun place. Food cost $10 and up. Fun fun fun.

topComments.author: Christina Rodriguez
topComments.comment: We had so much fun today. DRYTOWN is not a huge water park but ther are several diffrent water slides and an amazing lazy river. The kid are had an adorable playground. The food was delicious as well. We recommend this to anyone trying to have a splash on a hot day.

topComments.author: Matt
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O passe de temporada vale a pena se voc√™ for 3x ou mais. Os eventos noturnos s√£o √≥timos para evitar o sol (sem necessidade de protetor solar) e voc√™ n√£o precisa se preocupar com o concreto quente ao caminhar. Espero que eles se expandam com outra torre de tubo conforme o AV cresce, o mesmo deve acontecer com o parque aqu√°tico local. Muitas cadeiras e mesas de piquenique quase sempre sombreadas. Eles tamb√©m t√™m esta√ß√µes de prote√ß√£o solar self-service gratuitas (FPS 30) em todo o parque. Os salva-vidas t√™m uma rota√ß√£o oportuna entre os postos de vigil√¢ncia e t√™m uma rotina r√≠gida para ficar de olho em todas as √°reas.  (Original) The season pass is worth it if you go 3x or more. The night events are great for avoiding the sun (no sunscreen needed), and you don't have to worry about hot concrete when walking around. Hope they expand with another tube tower as the AV grows, so should the local water park. Plenty of chairs and picnic tables that are mostly shaded. They also have free self-serve sunscreen stations (30 SPF) throughout the park. The lifeguards have a timely rotation between watch stations and have a rigid routine to keep an eye on all areas.

topComments.author: Daniela Pintea
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Eu realmente gostei da simplicidade do parque e como ele √© mantido limpo e os salva-vidas est√£o por toda parte. No entanto, eles t√™m apenas um restaurante e n√£o conseguem acompanhar os pedidos. Meus filhos estavam morrendo de fome e a fila durava quase 2 horas. Tivemos que sair do parque para comer e voltar. Eles t√™m lanches que voc√™ pode comprar, mas esteja preparado. Voc√™ n√£o pode trazer comida para dentro e eu realmente gostei disso tamb√©m, caso contr√°rio, haveria peda√ßos de comida por toda parte. Mas ou voc√™ traz um piquenique e sai para comer, ou voc√™ entra na fila logo e n√£o espera no √∫ltimo minuto quando todo mundo fica com fome. Gostei muito do parque. Divers√£o!  (Original) I really liked the simplicity of the park and how it's kept clean and lifeguards are everywhere. However, they only have one restaurant and they can't keep up with the orders. My children were starving and the line was an almost 2 hours long. We had to get out of the park to eat and return. They have snacks you can buy but be prepared. You can't bring food inside and I actually liked that too, otherwise there would be pieces of food everywhere. But either you bring a picnic and get out to eat, either you get in line soon anough and don't wait last minute when everyone gets hungry. I really enjoyed the park. Fun!

topComments.author: Kevin J. Small (Killingemsmall)
topComments.comment: Awesome quick getaway if your in the antelope valley. Buy tickets early they usually sell out by noon

topComments.author: Ruben D√≠az diaz
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Lugar muito legal... minha filha de 9 anos adorou os escorregadores e minha filha de 5 meses gostou da piscina infantil, a √°gua estava quente o suficiente para ela aproveitar... muito limpo nas √°reas da piscina, mas o banheiro feminino estava muito sujo ... mas gostamos da experi√™ncia em geral  (Original) Very cool place... my 9 y/o daughter loved the slides and my 5 month old daughter enjoyed the kids pool, water was warm enough for her to enjoy... very clean in the pool areas, but women's restroom was very dirty... but we enjoyed the experience overall

topComments.author: Vanessa Acito
topComments.comment: I had an alright time, got there early there was a line had to wait till exactly 11. Just not being able to bring snacks in while 7 and half months pregnant  it was a hassle ,also itwas a bit much.you can see the security picked  and choose who To be more thoroughly with. But it wasn't to crowded. And the staff was nice and very on top of things inside the park they were well trained.

topComments.author: Marguerite Sur
topComments.comment: Nice small water park,  a perfect place for families. Decent entry prices, free parking and you can carry your cooler in with water only. The food is really yummy and not overpriced like most places.  $60 should feed your family of 4.

topComments.author: Kristen Diaz
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Park era muito limpo e n√£o super espalhado. √â o tamanho perfeito para nossas crian√ßas de 10 e 11 anos. A equipe estava sempre muito atenta a observar a √°gua em seu posto. As cabanas s√£o muito bonitas e limpas, minha √∫nica sugest√£o seria misters para se refrescar para quem n√£o vai na √°gua.  (Original) Park was very clean and not super spread out. It is the perfect size for our 10 and 11 year olds. Staff was always very attentive to watching the water at their post. Cabanas are very nice and clean, my only suggestion would be misters to cool off for those not going in the water.

topComments.author: Lucy R
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Amei! Teve um grande momento.. Apenas pense que as cabanas s√£o um pouco caras e se voc√™ for portador de passe, especialmente os residentes de Palmdale, deve ter algum tipo de desconto. Tamb√©m a pessoa da cabana seria uma √≥tima op√ß√£o para pedir comida.  (Original) Loved it! Had a great time.. Just think cabanas are a little overpriced and if your a pass holder especially Palmdale residents ,should have some type of discount. Also cabana person would be a great option to order food.

topComments.author: Jac P
topComments.comment: KUDOS to the lifeguards today saving the life of one of the teens who seized and became unresponsive in the lazy River.  Their response time was impeccable.  Words cannot even express how impressed I am with their abilities.  They all deserve a raise and standing ovation because without them the girl would have died.

topComments.author: Julia Prince
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Cidade Seca de Palmdale ‚úì A MELHOR divers√£o para a fam√≠lia acess√≠vel para a temporada de ver√£o .  Parque Aqu√°tico de tamanho decente, oferecendo atividades para todas as faixas et√°rias.  Limpo, seguro (guardas de vida certificados em todos os locais), E uma deliciosa pra√ßa de alimenta√ß√£o... Servindo sushi, tiras de frango e muito mais.  Compre um passe de temporada em maio e economize US$ 15. ou $80, que permite acesso total aos eventos di√°rios e noturnos de julho, das 19h √†s 22h.  Vejo voc√™s na Cidade Seca www.cityofpalmdale/Drytown.org  (Original) Palmdale's Dry Town ‚úì BEST Affordable Family fun for the summer season .  Decent size Water Park, offering actives for every age group.  Clean,safe(certified Life Guards at every venue), And Delicious Food Court ... Serving sushi , Chicken stripes, and much much more.  Buy a season pass in May & save $15.  or $80 which allows full access to daily as well as the Julys night times events 7pm-10pm.  See y'all at Dry Town www.cityofpalmdale/Drytown.org

topComments.author: Adam Hofmann
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Assentos sombreados eram limitados, voc√™ n√£o podia trazer seu pr√≥prio tubo interno ou lanches, os lanches que eles tinham eram muito insalubres, apenas refrigerante e junk food, nenhuma op√ß√£o saud√°vel, o restaurante s√≥ tinha uma janela de pedidos e eu estava esperando na fila por uma hora e metade eu estava morrendo de fome...lol um hamb√∫rguer era 10$ tacos eram $ 3,50. Agora, para o parque aqu√°tico, eles tinham um √≥timo parquinho infantil com 3 tobo√°guas, um rio lento, mas ao meio-dia estava lotado, e os tobo√°guas tamb√©m, eles tinham duas torres de tobo√°guas, uma tinha uma linha pequena, mas a outra uma longa linha ooen um com tubos tinha a fila mais longa que decidimos n√£o ir ... ent√£o √© um √≥timo parque aqu√°tico para ir se voc√™ n√£o se importa com longas filas uma comida ruim ... o ingresso de 25 $ foi um pre√ßo um pouco alto pela falta de entretenimento para adultos... eu iria de novo, mas eu iria comer antes e logo depois e apenas lidar com apenas √°gua pot√°vel, mas eu poderia ir para outro lugar... a menos que eu precise economizar algum dinheiro. Se eles fixassem a situa√ß√£o de sombreamento e a comida e talvez adicionassem outra torre de tobo√°gua, eu reconsideraria minhas opini√µes sobre o parque aqu√°tico.  (Original) Shaded seating was limited you could not bring in your own innertube or snacks, the snacks they hed were very unhealthy only soda and junk food no healthy option ,the resturant they had only had one order window and i was waiting in line for an hour and a half  i was starving...lol a burger was 10$  tacos were $ 3.50. Now for the waterpark they had a great kids playground with 3 water slides, a lazy river but by mid day it was packed, and soo were the slides, they had two waterslide towers one had a small line but the other a long line the ooen one with tubes had the longer line we decided not to go ...soo it a great waterpark to go to if you dont mind long lines a poor food  ...25$ ticket was a little steep a price for the lack of entertainment for adults... id go again but i would eat before and righy after and just deal with only drinking water but i might just go somewhere else...unless i need to save some money. If they fixed the shading situation and the food and maybe add another waterslide tower i would reconsider my views on the waterpark.

topComments.author: Arissa2008
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Fui l√° com a escola com a qual trabalho. Chegamos l√° na hora que foi comunicado com quem j√° est√° no comando. Eles n√£o estavam prontos para n√≥s e tivemos que esperar quando eles abriram o parque. Esperamos no port√£o por quase duas horas com mais de 50 alunos do ensino m√©dio. N√£o recebemos um pedido de desculpas, embora tenha sido comunicado a eles a que horas chegar√≠amos. Tamb√©m outras coisas n√£o eram boas para outras coisas da escola quando perguntadas sobre os banheiros.  (Original) Went there with the school i work with. We got there at the time that was communicated with who ever is in charge. They weren't ready for us and we had to wait for when they opened the park. We waited by the gate for almost two hours with 50+ middle school students. Didnt get an apology even though it was communicated to them what time we would be arriving. Also other stuff wasnt nice to other school stuff when asked about the bathrooms.

topComments.author: Lizzy Martinez
topComments.comment: i absolutely hated my experience here. I got swimmers rash after being in the lazy river and i am now i‚Äôm pain w these itchy red bumps. do not recommend

topComments.author: annuit c≈ìptis
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Muito divertido .. Para toda a fam√≠lia. Parque aqu√°tico Drytown localizado no leste de Palmdale, Calif√≥rnia 93550. Drytown water Park Palmdale √© um √≥timo complemento para o vale do ant√≠lope. N√£o tenho culpa de dizer que, quando meus filhos eram pequenos, adoravam vir aqui e aproveitar os dias quentes de ver√£o em Palmdale na √°gua. √â um local perfeito para vir se refrescar nos dias de calor do ver√£o. Infelizmente, n√£o est√° aberto por causa da pandemia. Mas quando se abre, deve ser embalado muito, muito rapidamente, rapidamente. N√£o perca a oportunidade de vir trazer sua fam√≠lia para curtir um dia inteiro na √°gua. No meio do deserto no deserto Oasis.  (Original) Very fun.. For all the family. Drytown water park located in east Palmdale California 93550. Drytown water Park Palmdale it's a great addition to the antelope valley. I'm not guilty, to say that when my kids were small they used to love coming here and enjoying the hot summer days in Palmdale in the water. It is a perfect spot to come and cool off in the summer heat days. Unfortunately it is not open because of the pandemic. But when it opens up it should get packed very very quick quickly. Don't miss out an opportunity to come and bring your family to enjoy a whole day in the water. In the middle of the desert in the desert Oasis.
